## 🛡️ 修改前後風險值
| 指標            | Risk Value (Before) | Risk Value Afterwards | Δ (改善幅度= Before - Afterwards ) | Δ% (改善百分比=(Before - Afterwards) / Before × 100%) | 剩餘風險判斷 (Before < After or Before < 12) |
|-----------------|-------------------|--------------------|--------------|-------------------------|---------------------------------------------|
